channel.title: bs9000
channel.description: If it isn't BS it isn't News...

item.title: Welcome to bs9000!
item.description:
Coming …. all your BS and more…..

“Most people seem to have been indoctrinated to believe that BS only comes from certain places, certain sources: advertising, politics, salesmen – not true. BS is everywhere. BS is rampant. Parents are full of BS,teachers are full of BS, clergymen are full of BS, and law enforcement people are full…of…BS – this entire country. This entire country is completely full of BS, and always has been…” ~ George Carlin
